nodes.text: Champions of the Force Previews 7: Solo Twins and Jedi Sentinel

Champions of the Force Previews 7: Solo Twins and Jedi Sentinel is a Wizards.com preview of figures from the Champions of the Force line of Star Wars Miniatures. Written by Sterling Hershey and Gary M. Sarli, it gives backgrounds, statistics, and strategies for the Jacen Solo, Jaina Solo, and Jedi Sentinel figures.
